meta.notes: Alchemons playful lore with unique descriptions per creature. Full 8×17 set.

creatures.name: FireLet
creatures.description: **FireLet** — In volcanic sanctums's ember forges, this lively let leaves trails of embers wherever it wanders. Breeders prize its knack for adding a twist of fire magic to any pairing.

creatures.name: WaterLet
creatures.description: **WaterLet** — This let calls the tidal grottos of lunar seas home, where its water mischief keeps both rivals and friends on edge.

creatures.name: EarthLet
creatures.description: **EarthLet** — Found roaming the root-crowned caverns of elder mountains, this let delights in outwitting Alchemon tamers. Its earth nature shows in every playful escape and curious glance.

creatures.name: AirLet
creatures.description: **AirLet** — Stories tell of this let darting through skyways and passes near stormward heights, always a step ahead, daring tamers to keep up. Its air energy is contagious.

creatures.name: SteamLet
creatures.description: **SteamLet** — Found roaming the hissing vents of geysers and baths, this let delights in outwitting Alchemon tamers. Its steam nature shows in every playful escape and curious glance.

creatures.name: LavaLet
creatures.description: **LavaLet** — In blackened calderas's basalt rivers, this lively let leaves trails of molten wake wherever it wanders. Breeders prize its knack for adding a twist of lava magic to any pairing.

creatures.name: LightningLet
creatures.description: **LightningLet** — Found roaming the anvil-clouds of split-sky storms, this let delights in outwitting Alchemon tamers. Its lightning nature shows in every playful escape and curious glance.

creatures.name: MudLet
creatures.description: **MudLet** — Found roaming the sunken bogs of peat-choked fens, this let delights in outwitting Alchemon tamers. Its mud nature shows in every playful escape and curious glance.

creatures.name: IceLet
creatures.description: **IceLet** — Stories tell of this let darting through blue glaciers near polar night, always a step ahead, daring tamers to keep up. Its ice energy is contagious.

creatures.name: DustLet
creatures.description: **DustLet** — Among the ruined colonnades of salt flats and ruins, it skips and scampers with sibilant grit in its wake. In breeding pens, its dust spark often shows up in unexpected ways.

creatures.name: CrystalLet
creatures.description: **CrystalLet** — This let calls the geode halls of hollow geodes home, where its crystal mischief keeps both rivals and friends on edge.

creatures.name: PlantLet
creatures.description: **PlantLet** — Found roaming the green vaults of old growth, this let delights in outwitting Alchemon tamers. Its plant nature shows in every playful escape and curious glance.

creatures.name: PoisonLet
creatures.description: **PoisonLet** — This let calls the violet stills of alembics and swamps home, where its poison mischief keeps both rivals and friends on edge.

creatures.name: SpiritLet
creatures.description: **SpiritLet** — Stories tell of this let darting through thin places near veilbound paths, always a step ahead, daring tamers to keep up. Its spirit energy is contagious.

creatures.name: DarkLet
creatures.description: **DarkLet** — This let calls the umbra courts of moonless vaults home, where its Dark mischief keeps both rivals and friends on edge.

creatures.name: LightLet
creatures.description: **LightLet** — Among the dawn stairs of sunward terraces, it skips and scampers with auric hush in its wake. In breeding pens, its light spark often shows up in unexpected ways.

creatures.name: BloodLet
creatures.description: **BloodLet** — Stories tell of this let darting through red rites near vital altars, always a step ahead, daring tamers to keep up. Its blood energy is contagious.

types.name: Fire
types.description: Born of flame; passionate and volatile.

types.name: Water
types.description: Fluid and adaptive; calm or crushing.
